description: Try our easy to follow Easy Beef Chow Mein recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Beef Chow Mein Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt Maggi 2 Minute Instant Beef Noodles
1 pkt Maggi Your Meal Your Way Chow Mein

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add mince and stir-fry, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 3 minutes or until browned.
Meanwhile, cook noodles according to packet instructions, discarding flavour sachets. Drain. Roughly cut strands of noodles with scissors.
Add vegetables to mince, then stir-fry for 8 minutes or until just tender.
Combine 1 cup water and Maggi recipe base in a small jug. Add sauce mixture to mince mixture and bring to the boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Add noodles and toss to combine. Divide among bowls and serve.
